singleton

Interface Singleton<Type>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Command<Type>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddClient, AddCreditCard, AddCustomer, AddPlay, ClientList, CustomerList, ExitApplication, Help, ListAllClients, ListAllCustomers, ListAllPlays, PlayList, RemoveClient, RemoveCreditCard, RemoveCustomer, RetrieveData, StoreData, Theater, UI

    public interface Singleton<Type>
    An interface to force the use of readResolve() when creating a singleton class. Unfortunately, simply implementing this does not functionally make it a singleton.
    Author:
    Joshua Zierman [py1422xs@metrostate.edu]

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Type readResolve()
      Resolves a read by having it use the required static instance method call

    • Method Detail

      • readResolve

        Type readResolve()
        Resolves a read by having it use the required static instance method call
        Returns:
        an instance of the singleton
